A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It was disgrace for all the star wars saga. All the characters that we've seen before on episodes IV\, V and VI lack of matureness and wisdom. It doesn't feel like a true star wars movie. With Luke Skywalker acting so selfishly and scared of what would happen if he had truly trained Ray. After all\, it had great scenes and everything but\, as I've said before\, it wasn't a true Star Wars film.
